definition: Facebook (Internet slang, pun reading "you must die")
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
(negative prefix)/not/no
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: On Friday, Facebook announced it is making its Web site available in the Farsi language.
sentences.chinese: 周五，非死不可宣布他正在制作波斯文网站。

sentences.english: I have my current boss as a Facebook friend.
sentences.chinese: 我非死不可上的好友里有我现在的老板啊妈。

sentences.english: If he pulls the plug, our sick economy is going to die.
sentences.chinese: 他一拔掉氧气管，我们虚弱不堪的经济非死不可。
今天我的非死不可被黑了。

sentences.english: I can't—I'd die if they was to wake.
sentences.chinese: 不行，要是他们醒来，我非死不可。

definition: to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
(idiom) dead end/road to ruin
to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
mortal
to be at death's door (idiom)
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
to lose one's life/to get killed
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to fight to one's last gasp
to place sb on field of death/to confront with mortal danger/to give sb no way out/with one's back to the wall/looking death in the eye/part of idiom 置之死地而後生|置之死地而后生
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
